name: Mason Walker
bio: Mason Walker is a dynamic central midfielder known for his exceptional passing range and vision on the pitch. Hailing from the scenic landscapes of British Columbia, he blends technical skill with a relentless work ethic, making him a fan favorite. His left foot is a weapon, capable of delivering pinpoint crosses and stunning long-range strikes, while his leadership qualities inspire teammates. Walker's knack for creating chances has made him a key player for Fraser Valley United.
